author: Tim Vickerman
comment: After using the free one, I decided that I could do with the added convenience and extra features of the paid version. And the app works fine. But after three months, I was asked to pay again to continue using the Plus features. But I've already bought this app! Poor. Stick to the free version.
title: I paid for a trial?

author: Saifullah Badar
comment: Very easy to use specially with the auto fill option. Difficult for people who can't read Japanese as the search input and the result is all in Japanese.
title: Extremely handy when on the go
